content.text: From the table above, find out the value of c

solution.text:
Since X and Y are inversely proportional XY = k
Therefore, \(80 \times c = 10 \times a\)
From previous subpart, \(a = _{{2*j}}_\)
\( c = \frac a8 = \frac {_{{2*j}}_}{8}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) c= _{{trunc(Decimal(j)/Decimal(4), 2)}}_
